attributes.action: abolish tax on sanitary protection for ladies!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgusting that women and girls have to pay tax on sanitary products. 
Menstruation is a normal bodily function, and one we cannot prevent.
The last thing we should have to pay tax on is the products we have to utilise several times a day, every month for a very substantial chunk of our lives!!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition AT http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/taxfreesanitary/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
